page.title: 19WELLKNOWN PEOPLE in RHAYADER
page.content: {Commander Richard Compton-Hall,MBE, Royal Navy (rtd),Director of the Royal Navy Submarine Museum at Gosport, Hampshire,commanded three submarines during his service career.Besides his books on submarines he is the author of over 1000 articles,T.V.and Radio programmes.He is an internationally known consultant on submarine matters and was recently responsible for raising HM Submarine No1 (Holland 1) and is now salvaging Garrett's Resurgam off the N.Wales coast. {Raye and Jim Guthrie:}writers working under the name of 'David Creed',seven novels published to date plus numerous other writings including advertising copy and sports journalism.They have travelled and worked in many parts of the world;the Gulf,Lebanon,S.America, New Guinea,to name but a few,basing their novels on these countries.
